questSteps.stepDescription: Enter the New Foundations portal outside King Roald's throne room in Varrock Palace. (Chat 1)
After the conversation has ended, enter through the door and talk to King Roald. (Chat âœ“)
After the cutscene, talk with King Roald. (Chat 2)
Travel north-east from Varrock, near Jolly Boar Inn and the easternmost boundary of the Wilderness wall.
additionalStepInformation: Fastest way to get there is by teleporting to the Infernal Source Dig Site and run slightly north-east.

questSteps.stepDescription: Click the portal to "Continue New Foundations". (Chat 1) then defeat all the armoured zombies
Talk to Bill towards the north of the well.
When the chat has ended, go southwest to the Fort Forinthry blueprints (table behind the bank chest) to build the Workshop.
Check the plans with the Fort Forinthry blueprints and start building the Workshop (Tier 1). Use Additional Information if you are new to building plans.
additionalStepInformation: 96 Planks or Logs.
24 Limestone or Limestone Bricks.
Limestone turns into Limestone Bricks by using the Stonecutter then use the Stonecutter again for Wall Segements.
Logs turn into planks by using the Sawmill then use it again for Refined Planks then use the Wood Working Bench to make Wooden Frames.
When you have completed a plan it will spawn build sites. The Glowing Sparkly One is the better one that gives slightly more XP than just one of the regulars.
The optimal Construction hotspot moves periodically but improves the progress slightly.

questSteps.stepDescription: Head to the Blue Moon Inn in Varrock and talk to Aster (outside by the tables).
Head to Gunnarsgrunn (Barbarian Village) and talk to Overseer Siv.
Head to Draynor Village and speak to Father Flint in the Draynor Village marketplace.
Head back to the fort and speak to Bill.

Building the fortifications. You need a total of 328 Limestone to be turned into Limestone Bricks for wall segments, 20 Logs to be turned into 20 Planks. Below is a list of each spot that needs fortified with its respected amount of material.
additionalStepInformation: Front gate - 6 stone wall segments, 10 planks
Rear gate - 6 stone wall segments, 10 planks
West wall - 10 stone wall segments
North-west wall - 5 stone wall segments
North wall section 1 - 10 stone wall segments
North wall section 2 - 10 stone wall segments
North-east wall - 5 stone wall segments
East wall - 10 stone wall segments
South-east wall - 5 stone wall segments
South wall section 1 - 5 stone wall segments
South wall section 2 - 5 stone wall segments
South-west wall - 5 stone wall segments

questSteps.stepDescription: Once all structures have been built, talk to Bill and finish the dialogue.
additionalStepInformation: The title you choose may be changed afterwards.
